hero.name: João Victor
hero.title: Hello, my name is
hero.subtitle: I'm fullstack web developer
hero.text: Fullstack developer used to Linux environments. I have experience with a wide range of technologies, including Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Java, Spring Boot, JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, Git, GitHub, SQLite, PostgreSQL, and Docker. In my free time, I enjoy customizing my Linux environment (also known as ricing), from visual appearance to scripts and shortcuts that help improve productivity.
